text.section: The Fund is a continuing, nonlapsing fund that is not subject to § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.

section.section: The Fund consists of appropriations that are made to the Fund from the State budget.
For each fiscal year, the Governor shall include in the annual State budget an appropriation of $500,000 for the Fund.

Subject to paragraph (2) of this subsection, money from the Fund shall be distributed to counties for senior citizen activities centers based on a competitive grant process administered by the Department.

text.section: The Fund shall be invested and reinvested in the same manner as other State funds.
